Hello

The game is very tricky about my keyboard assignment. I got an Azerty keyboard.

But the game seems to recognize my keyboard as Qwerty so I assigned W for pitch up, by hitting Z and S for pitch down by hitting S.

Same problem for alphanumerical keys, I must select shift to get these keys, but when I hit 3 on my keyboard, without shift, the game takes it like 3. So well, pretty easy.

I make all the keyboard assignment on my AZERTY as if it was a QWERTY, hen I play one or 2 times. I quit the game. I use other apps.

I start a new game and this time the game sees an AZERTY keyboard, so the key assignment i made before is completly upset, as my Pitch up is not recognize, when I hit Z it is no more recognize as W, it is recognize like Z. Direct hit on 3 is recognize as "double quote", as I should hit shift 3 to get 3.

So I must re assign all my keys to play.

And a few days later, the it tricks again, recognizing my AZERTY keyboard like a QWERTY....

Any idea what's going on? I have no such problem on other games.....

The QWE,ASD is standard arrangement for first person shooters. There should be provisions for getting that same arrangement on your Azerty keyboard. Or just plug in a Querty board for the game.

Normally, most games allow you to remap keys and save the settings. Haven't check to see if that option has been implemented or not.

Thank's but the fact is that whatever the board, once the assignments have been done one one board the game reacts positively, then a few days later it reacts as if the assignment have been done on the other keyboard!!!
I'm a azerty user also i got the same problem =/

Also a topic like this may be better suited for the support section, rather than gameplay questions.
